title: 09/06: Start or Sit; GB-CHI Recap; Antonio Brown's Trade Value (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Let's recap the game (1:30)! What a thriller! How do we see the CHI backfield playing out as we move forward? Is Geronimo Allison droppable and is Mitchell Trubisky really that bad? Then we talk about Antonio Brown's trade value (13:10). Should you give up someone like Curtis Samuel for Brown? ... Some fun stats to know for the NFC home games (16:30), an "Offense vs. Defense" debate (18:15), Beat the Waiver Wire (24:00) and the Startometer (26:40) for guys like David Johnson, Sterling Shepard, Marvin Jones and Miles Sanders ... ATL-MIN (31:40), LAR-CAR (40:00), SF-TB (45:30), DET-ARI (50:30), NYG-DAL (57:10), CIN-SEA (1:01:00), WAS-PHI (1:04:00) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com*Time stamps are approximate
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
